item.description:
Original Slashers Double Feature!
Friday The 13th at 10:00 Buy Tickets
Double Feature w/MY BLOODY VALENTINE (Non-3D because it's the Original!)
(1980) dir Sean S. Cunningham w/Betsy Palmer, Adrienne King, Jeannine Taylor, Robbi Morgan, Kevin Bacon [95 min]
Forget the remake, the original FRIDAY THE 13TH is a bloody, messy good-time. No hockey-mask toting thug here, just a bunch of rowdy kids at a campground and an unseen killer who starts picking them off one-by-one. It seems that all is not right at the infamous Camp Crystal Lake and, as the counselors get up to their old tricks of sex, drugs, and rock’n’roll, someone is looking to settle a score. Don’t miss this chance to celebrate one of the original ‘slasher’ films on this most appropriate of dates.
http://www.brattlefil...
item.name: ORIGINAL Slasher Double Feature
